website_summaries.verdict: Normally LEGO’s Millennium Falcon sets are fairly expensive, but this smaller, cuter, and cheaper model makes it easier for kids to build and enjoy Chewbacca’s spaceship.
pros: Millennium Falcon is easy to assemble
Chewie fits in the Falcon’s pilot seat
Falcon fires red studs from cannon
cons: This version of the iconic spaceship is a small one

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Lego Star Wars - shipping package not so much
customer_reviews.text: Lego Star Wars set is spectacular - love the microfighters and this new version of the Millennium Falcon in particular. My issue is with the packaging. It wasn’t properly protected so the box was crushed during shipping. For those Lego fans who are nerdy collectors but actually build the sets - the box is a part of the set along with the directions. or maybe it’s just me. Protect the Lego box people!!!
customer_reviews.author: bevyn

customer_reviews.title: Crushed
customer_reviews.text: Bought this Lego set for a gift. The box came out of the packaging smashed. I am embarrassed to give it as a gift. I work with learning disabled students - I don't think they would understand that the Lego set came that way in the mail. I'm sure the pieces inside the box survived the harsh treatment. The box definitely didn't.
customer_reviews.author: Bibbi Lofile

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Smashed...
customer_reviews.text: Little box arrived smashed under a 10 lb bag of cat food, not a great presentation for a Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.author: roxybroadway

customer_reviews.title: Beware of the missile launchers
customer_reviews.text: Great first Star Wars set for my four year old. Love the detail on Chewie. HOWEVER, it really is for older kids (box says 6-12). The reason is the projectile launching weapons. It’s one thing to have stationary weapons on a toy, but these shoot little tiny LEGO pieces at a surprising speed. My son is 4.5 and I hate to sound like my mother, but these seem dangerous. If not for that and the crushed box, it would easily get 5 stars from me. That’s said, I’d still recommend for the Star Wars lover.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: cute but tiny projectiles
customer_reviews.text: While the Falcon and Chewy are iconic and well represented in this kit, it is not for younger kids. It has two blasters that shoot. The projectiles should be larger making finding them easier. The instructions were a little tougher than usual to follow but, not impossible. It had several odd extra pieces which made me almost go through the entire build to see if I had missed steps. Yet, only contained 2 replacement projectiles. The Chewy character is fantastic with his bow. Almost worth the price alone.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids!
customer_reviews.text: A toy is an item that is used in play, especially one designed for such use. Playing with toys can be an enjoyable means of training young children for life in society. Different materials like wood, clay, paper, and plastic are used to make toys. Many items are designed to serve as toys, but goods produced for other purposes can also be used. For instance, a small child may fold an ordinary piece of paper into an airplane shape and "fly it". Newer forms of toys include interactive digital entertainment. Some toys are produced primarily as collectors' items and are intended for display only.
customer_reviews.author: gus oropeza

customer_reviews.title: Cute Mini Falcon!
customer_reviews.text: We love Star Wars and Legos in our house. I am a busy mom of 4, so I don't have time to sit and build a several hundred piece creation. Especially when I always have "help" and "commentors." This was the perfect size for me. I put it together in minutes, and I love that it shoots little lego pieces. Great price, as well!
customer_reviews.author: Nicki B

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces !
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 sets. One for my son and one for his cousin as a gift. When my son opened his set, there were pieces missing . Chewbacca had 2 torso pieces but no legs . There were a few other pieces missing as well. My son was so disappointed and we decided to open up the other set which was supposed to be a gift . Fortunately, the other set was complete . I just had to buy another gift for the cousin . Never had this happen with a LEGO set before .
customer_reviews.author: Srao

customer_reviews.title: Lego's perfection and star wars beauty
customer_reviews.text: If you combine star wars and legos it's like dunking oreos in milk, you know it's going to be perfect! Both legos and star wars are timeless age independent beautiful creations. The only complaint, which is with all legos, is the large price tag they bring with them. But like always it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Caustin Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Very nice small Millennium Falcon Lego with Chewy!
customer_reviews.text: Great small set of Legos for my favorite 10-yr-old who had the Millenium Falcon on his Christmas list ( I couldn't see spending $1000+ for the regular-size set!) He was pleased and put it together using the instructions in about 15-20 minutes but then played for a long time. Love the Chewbacca figure that comes with it! Can't go wrong with Legos!
customer_reviews.author: pbpvol

customer_reviews.title: fun little size
customer_reviews.text: Chewy is nicely made of three parts: the legs, top with arms and the head that contains the chest. Tall little sucker. Fun size and item was easy enough to build up by my four-year old. Box comes with a few extra pieces (I do not know why, perhaps in case some of them are lost while building?)
customer_reviews.author: BHA

customer_reviews.title: Its Lego
customer_reviews.text: Its a Lego set. Came with all of the pieces. Bought for my 10 year old. He put it together easily and quickly. Quality is as expected with Lego. Only complaint? The price of course. Lego is a bit pricey for plastic tiny pieces, but they do last forever.
customer_reviews.author: hatbox121

customer_reviews.title: lego star wars millennium falcon
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these as I have a 7 year old who is just a lego builder extradinaire - and he has a little brother who is not quite as good at it yet - but always wants what big brother has - so good big brother builds two. One for himself and one for little brother. He doesn't seem to mind because he just loves the build. The oldest loves the Star Wars story - it's all new to him. So this kit was great.
customer_reviews.author: ForeverYOUNGTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old son loved this cute little kit. He enjoyed building it by himself, and then he had fun playing with the assembled ship for a few days. It made a great diversion for him while I needed to get some work done. You could pay this price for the mini figure alone.
customer_reviews.author: Doorstep Diva

customer_reviews.title: Perfect small gift
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my son for Valentine's Day. He didn't have Chewbacca yet, so this was a pretty affordable option of getting the mini figure in a set. He loved it. It's a quick build, but I knew that it wouldn't be super challenging. I just wanted an affordable, fun, and small set and this fit the bill.
customer_reviews.author: J&CBaxter

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for a Star Wars fan young or old
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son for a stocking stuffer. It was a big hit! He put it together right away and has it on his desk at work. Great gift for a Star Wars fan young or old!
customer_reviews.author: lwh

customer_reviews.title: Super fun!!
customer_reviews.text: I love Star Wars, and I love Chewie, so this was an awesome gift for myself!! As always, Lego made a great product that is easy to put together! I only gave it 4 stars because the box was smushed when I opened to package.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Davis

customer_reviews.title: Cute Little Set
customer_reviews.text: I'm not usually a fan of the microfighters. I really only bought this one because I wanted Chewie for a MOC, and this set happened to be on sale. It's fine. It's got two stud shooters on the top.
customer_reviews.author: J. Wilfong

customer_reviews.title: Great little(tiny) set
customer_reviews.text: Would not recommend for small kids maybe kids in the double digits. Very small set of legos I believe the dog ate chewbaca since we have not found after assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Kerra Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: I guess I didn't pay to much attention to the size, but it was a great stocking stuffer and added to his lego star wars collection perfectly
customer_reviews.author: K. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Instructions confusing.
customer_reviews.text: We had a hard time putting this together. The instructions where pictures only and where not very clear. No way a younger kid could do it by themselves correctly alone. But once 9ut together my child did enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel J. Baxter

customer_reviews.title: Super cool and super tiny
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and is a nice play on the traditional Lego Star Wars offerings. Be sure to check the alternative builds available on YT.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer Dude

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Set
customer_reviews.text: We bought it for my sons 9th birthday. He loved it. It wasn’t difficult. Within a short time he had it all put together and playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, takes 10-15 minutes. I really love shooting the laser legos. They also give you a few extra incase you lose them
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: LEGO Millennium Falcon!
customer_reviews.text: Oh Thank you grandma! Look dad, I got LEGOS. . .the Millennium Falcon! Didn't you have one as a kid dad?. . . .yes, son, 40 years ago. Wish I really had that 40 yr. old Millennium Falcon.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Got this and several legos for gifts for boys of varying ages and they all loved them! One of the boys moms asked where I got the gift so she could buy some for her son's friends!
customer_reviews.author: SFCF

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal!
customer_reviews.text: LEGO will be always the best toy in the world... Triple score if is LEGO Star Wars! and this collection is amazing, the price was very good also.
customer_reviews.author: Karla Murillo

customer_reviews.title: Star Wars Lego tradition
customer_reviews.text: Christmas present for my 20 and 27 year old sons. They love their Star Wars LEGO mini sets. I’m sure my grandson will too when he’s old enough.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Good Value, Great Gift!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice little lego set at a great price. I got this as a Christmas present for my fiance to build with our 3 year old. They had so much fun!
customer_reviews.author: Corren Love

customer_reviews.title: great for Lego Therapy
customer_reviews.text: This kit has a lot of small pieces so if you have dexterity issues they may need help assembling and disassembling. Lego lever or having finger nails recommended
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute little fun set
customer_reviews.text: Cute little wookie... Not the same Chewbacca as the one that comes in the millennium falcon Kessel run set, neat!
customer_reviews.author: Hung Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: It had all the parts
customer_reviews.text: Got this kit so I could build an assembly in solidworks. It wasn't bad to build at all and gave it to a kid once I was done
customer_reviews.author: Troy Boone

customer_reviews.title: So great for the money
customer_reviews.text: Another tiny set of detailed Star Wars legos that my man loved. Chewbacca is awesome!!! IG: @CLHEEKZ
customer_reviews.author: C.E.S.

customer_reviews.title: Not much to this one
customer_reviews.text: Alright, but not great. Not something I would want to display compared to other offerings. Can't beat the price though.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Axelrod

customer_reviews.title: Fun affordable gift for the LEGO and Star Wars lover.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my nephew because he loves LEGO and he loves Star Wars. He loved it! It was fun and affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Small, but great for fans with limited space
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for fans of lego + star wars, but are very limited on space for the larger sort of builds. This adult fan is extremely satisfied.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value
customer_reviews.text: The perfect birthday gift for our little Star Wars lover. Our 6 year old enjoyed following the directions and assembling it himself, and Chewie is SO cute!!

customer_reviews.title: Listed in wrong age group in my opinion
customer_reviews.text: Even though I give a five star rating, it's not for 5 year olds. My 9 year old grandson had to put it together for my 5 year old grandson.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Himmelrick

customer_reviews.title: Good-looking, very small Lego figures. I wish it ...
customer_reviews.text: Good-looking, very small Lego figures. I wish it didn’t cost so much, but what are you gonna do when your grandson loves Lego Star Wars? We’re going to use it for his cake decoration.
customer_reviews.author: Marielyn O.

customer_reviews.title: Chewie!
customer_reviews.text: It is Lego Chewie and the Millennium Falcon - what's not to love? Oh, don't worry you can replace the sensor dish with a round piece and pretend it's the classic Falcon.

customer_reviews.title: It's LEGO so buy it
customer_reviews.text: It's LEGO so there's nothing negative I can say. It's very fun to assemble. Very easy and although it's small it's very detailed.
customer_reviews.author: camico

customer_reviews.title: Kiddo loves it
customer_reviews.text: We love the microbuilds in our house. Theyre perfect for me 4yr old.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent small Star Wars LEGO
customer_reviews.text: It’s LEGO and Star Wars. What could be better. Oh yeah, The millennium falcon and Chewbacca. And the that the falcon shoots red “lasers”

customer_reviews.title: Great for young people that love Star Wars
customer_reviews.text: My great nephew loved it. There was excitement in his voice when he opened the present. That is the best sign of all.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good I guess

customer_reviews.title: Great stocking stuffer!

customer_reviews.text: Great product for a great price. Exactly what you pay for.

customer_reviews.text: IT did not bring building instructions...How is my 7 year Old..son supposed to assemble

customer_reviews.text: Nice *little* Falcon. A bit of a pill to swallow spending 10-11 bucks on something this small. That said, the kids love it.

customer_reviews.title: Another nice falcon!
customer_reviews.text: Another nice piece by LEGO, and bravo for making it Chewie's Falcon, and NOT including that insufferable mary-sue. Recommended.

product_meta.title: LEGO Star Wars Millennium Falcon Microfighter 75193 Building Kit (92 Pieces)
product_meta.description: Zoom into action with the LEGO Star Wars 75193 Millennium Falcon Microfighter. This Star Wars toy features lots of authentic detailing, 2 stud shooters and space to seat the included Chewbacca Star Wars minifigure with his bowcaster.
feature_bullets: Build a miniature LEGO Star Wars Millennium Falcon toy
Easy to build Star Wars spaceship playset includes a Chewbacca figure
Measures over 1-inch (4cm) high, 3-inch (8cm) long and 3-inch (8cm) wide
92 pieces – Building kit for boys and girls age 6-12 LEGO Star Wars building toys are compatible with all LEGO construction sets for creative building

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars1,272 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
